about.title: What is AFRO IN?
about.subtitle.part1: We are a cultural movement seeking to unite

about.features.art.title: Afro Art
about.features.art.desc: Traditional, contemporary, and modern dance from African and Afro-Colombian roots.
about.features.music.title: Live Music
about.features.music.desc: Drums, marimba, and ancestral rhythms connecting with our roots.
about.features.fashion.title: African Fashion
about.features.fashion.desc: Fashion shows with unique designs celebrating Afro identity.
about.features.education.title: Education
about.features.education.desc: Workshops and educational programs in schools and communities.
